gpt_comment: In Brussels, it's set to be a sunny day with average temperatures around 23.8°C, peaking at 29°C and dipping to 17°C at night. There's no rain expected according to all the available sources. Perfect weather to enjoy a day out, maybe even spot some monkeys at the local zoo.
